text: Baluna, ‘ami ki tomaderake era ceye nikrsta parinamera sambada deba ya allahara kache ache? Yake allaha la’nata karechena ebam yara upara tini krodhanbita hayechena. Ara yadera ka'uke tini banara o ka'uke sukara karechena [1] ebam (tadera ke'u) tagutera ibadata kareche. Tara'i abasthanera dika theke nikrsta ebam sarala patha theke sabaceye besi bicyuta’
